intro: Road-map to turn Example Business into the digital alpha. Below is a 180-day playbook that tackles weak spots and doubles down on strengths.
phase0Details:
- Listings lock-down
- Review engine rev-up
- Website first aid
- Social content cadence reset
phase1Details:
- Paid search & retargeting flywheel
- Lead-magnet overhaul
- Reputation showcase widgets
- Social ads: micro-targeted fun
phase2Details:
- SEO content expansion
- Digital retailing/e-commerce stack
- First-party data & marketing automation
- Experience-layer innovation
keyMetrics:
| KPI | Baseline | 90-Day Target | 180-Day Target |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Listing Accuracy | 62% | 90% | 95% |
| Avg. Review Rating | 4.37 | 4.55 | ≥4.6 |
| Mobile LCP | 8.3 s | 3 s | <2.5 s |
closing: By tightening the nuts, injecting premium fuel and installing a turbo, the business will roar past competitors after the 180‑day mark.
recommendations:
- Improve SEO
- Engage on social media
